title: 50 Things To Do When You Turn 50
description: This attractive hardcover gift edition is a revision of our best-selling compilation of inspiring essays.Written by some of the most brilliant achievers of the day including: Garrison Keillor, Suze Orman, Bobbi Brown and Marianne Williamson, these essays celebrate a momentous event with inspiring, humorous, and thoughtful commentary. The popular trade paperback edition has sold over 110,000 copies.
author: Ronnie Sellers
